Title: Dead Man's Party
Plot: When Buffy returns home she finds that the life she left behind may not be as easy to slip back into as she has to battle not only the rising dead, but also the distrust of her mother and the silent resentment of her friends.
GuestStars: Paul Morgan Stetler, Chris Garnant, Nancy Lenehan, Danny Strong, Jason Hall, Kristine Sutherland, Armin Shimerman
